# Integrated Physical Therapy

> Specialized manual therapy, orthopedic, and spine physical therapy in the Madison, WI area

## About
Integrated Physical Therapy (IPT) provides advanced manual physical therapy specializing in orthopedics, spine therapy, sports medicine, and chronic pain management. Our therapists focus on finding and treating the cause of injury, reducing postural imbalances, and restoring optimal function.

## Specialties
- Orthopedic Physical Therapy
- Advanced Spine Therapy
- Sports Medicine & Rehabilitation
- Schroth Scoliosis & Kyphosis Treatment
- Chronic & Complex Pain Management
- Dry Needling
- Vestibular & Balance Rehabilitation
- TeleRehab (Virtual PT)
- Functional Capacity Evaluations (FCE)
- Visceral Manipulation

## Locations

- Hours: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm

### Cottage Grove
- Address: 645 Sandpiper Trail, Cottage Grove, WI 53527
- Hours: Tue 1pm-5pm, Wed 8am-12pm, Fri 12pm-5pm
